snippet: The 330-93 vote is expected to propel the bill to final passage before the bank’s authorization expires on May 31, siding with business groups over conservative activists who wanted Republicans to let the bank’s charter lapse.
abstract: House votes 330-93 to extend the life of the Export-Import Bank of the United States, siding with business groups over conservative activists who wanted Republicans to let the bank's charter lapse on May 31; vote is expected to propel the bill to final passage in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: The 330-93 vote is expected to propel the bill to final passage before the bank’s authorization expires on May 31, siding with business groups over conservative activists who wanted Republicans to let the bank’s charter lapse.

headline.seo: House Votes Decisively to Extend Export-Import Bank
headline.main: House Votes Overwhelmingly to Extend Export-Import Bank
headline.print_headline: House Votes Overwhelmingly to Extend Export-Import Bank
